name: Azerbaijan
title: Garasu Volcano, Azerbaijan
dec: Many visitors to Azerbaijan may not know that the country has the highest number of mud volcanoes in the world

name: Belgium
title: Bruges, Belgium
dec: Bruges began on the banks of the river Reie, and as it grew, so did a series of waterways connecting it to the Zwin estuary and the North Sea.

name: Brazil
title: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
dec: Rio's first settlement began below these peaks, near the long Praia da Urca beach, and you can tour one of the three early forts there, the star-shaped Fort São João.

name: Nepal
title: Bhaktapur, Nepal
dec: Bhaktapur, the third of the Royal Cities, lies on the old trade route to Tibet, just outside of Kathmandu

name: Netherlands
title: Anne Frank House, Netherlands
dec: The Anne Frank House is a must-see when in Amsterdam. On Prinsengracht, in the home where Anne's family hid for much of WWII

name: Mexico
title: Alaska’s Coast, Mexico
dec: In the midst of the pandemic, Alaska's entire May to September cruise season was cancelled in 2020.
